column3: Welcome, friend! Didn’t realize there was anyone else down here.;Name’s <color=red>Redgie</color>. Red block. Big voice.;I am one of many units built to guide.;See that plate on the ground? Help me onto it.;I have impeccable sitting abilities.
I can feel myself being pulled towards you now.

Trigger: When the exit opens and the level is completed
column3: Nicely done!;I guess I should tell you about this place.;You’ve landed in the Scrap Well, but don’t despair…..;You’re not trash, just misplaced, every magnet has a purpose.;You may yet find yours.;My friends and I will show you the way.
